Remembering [[Jiraiya]]'s words about never abandoning his [[nindō|ninja way]], Naruto creates a fully charged [[Rasengan]], but increases its mass and raw force. It has shown enough power to blast away an entire wall of a fortress and even decimate it in a matter of minutes. Unlike a normal [[Rasengan]], which fades away after striking its target, this version does not disappear until [[Naruto]] was finished destroying the entire fortress. This technique can be compared with the [[Big Ball Rasengan]] having many similarities, except being much smaller.

[[es:Rasengan de Agallas]]
[[pl:Dokonjō Rasengan]]
[[pt-br:Rasengan da Determinação]]
